statements: SELECT * FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking
SELECT device_id, location, quantity FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_id, location FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT tag_id, product_id, quantity FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT * FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking WHERE device_id = 'abcd-1234-efgh-5678'
SELECT tag_id, location, quantity FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT * FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking WHERE location LIKE 'Storage%' LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_count > 5 ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM RFID_Inventory_Tracking WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' AND last_updated < '2022-03-01' ORDER BY last_updated ASC
SELECT * FROM RFIDData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM RFIDData WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT data FROM RFIDData WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM InventoryManagement WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM InventoryManagement ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM RFIDData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, data->'temperature' AS temperature FROM RFIDData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM RFIDData GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, location FROM InventoryManagement WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT device_id, JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(data->'readings') AS num_readings FROM RFIDData ORDER BY num_readings DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM RFID_Data;
SELECT id, timestamp, device_id, data FROM RFID_Data;
SELECT id, data FROM RFID_Data WHERE device_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location, event_id FROM Track_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM RFID_Data WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, data FROM RFID_Data WHERE device_id = 201 AND data LIKE '%error%';
SELECT id, location, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY location, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Track_data WHERE event_id = 501 AND location IN ('A1', 'B2', 'C3') ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT id, event_id, location FROM Track_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-02-01 00:00:00';
SELECT event_id, device_id, event_type, event_timestamp, event_data FROM RFID_Events;
SELECT device_name, device_location, device_status FROM Devices WHERE device_status = TRUE;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_category FROM Inventory_Items WHERE item_stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT track_id, item_id, device_id, track_timestamp FROM Item_Tracking ORDER BY track_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, device_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM RFID_Events WHERE event_type = 'scan' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM RFID_Events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM RFID_Events WHERE event_type = 'Scan' AND device_id = 12345 ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_stock_quantity FROM Inventory_Items WHERE item_stock_quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM Devices WHERE device_status = TRUE AND device_location LIKE '%Room%';

SELECT i.item_name, d.device_name, t.track_timestamp FROM Inventory_Items i JOIN Item_Tracking t ON i.item_id = t.item_id JOIN Devices d ON t.device_id = d.device_id WHERE t.track_location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY t.track_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM RFID_Data;
SELECT device_id, tag_id FROM RFID_Data WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM Device WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT device_id, location, timestamp FROM Tracking WHERE location LIKE '%Floor%';
SELECT * FROM RFID_Data WHERE location='Warehouse A' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND location='Store B' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM Device WHERE manufacturer='Samsung' OR manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT * FROM Tracking WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND device_id=1001 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT message FROM Alerts WHERE timestamp < '2022-09-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
